name: @danielkalen/data_table
description: Tiny library for displaying database-fetched data in an HTML table with front-end pagination

scripts.compile: npm run compile:js && npm run compile:sass
scripts.compile:js: foreach -g 'src/coffee/*.coffee' -x 'simplyimport -i {{path}} | coffee -b -s -c > dist/js/{{name}}.pretty.js && uglifyjs dist/js/{{name}}.pretty.js -m -c keep_fargs,unused=false -o dist/js/{{name}}.js'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:sass
scripts.watch:js: simplywatch 'src/coffee/*.coffee' -e 'coffee' -x 'simplyimport -i {{path}} | coffee -b -s -c > dist/js/{{name}}.pretty.js && uglifyjs dist/js/{{name}}.pretty.js -m -c keep_fargs,unused=false > dist/js/{{name}}.js'

author: Daniel Kalen
